positive.review:
I notice a lot of people complaining about the difficulty of maxing out party members. But I can bet they are spending all their gems and tickets immediately on pulls. This is why,. The free characters are fine, and as long as you can just build a proper party, spend your currency on promote materials. I wont deny their will always be some wall, but its a free to play game, I've been playing for months " played before steam launch" and maybe spent 0.99 I'm still progressing just fine.  Also the art and animations remind me of Destiny child. Not literally, but it gives me the same vibe, Some of the best in the genre in my opinion.

So dont overextend your resources, Focus on a core 4 characters and be patient.

Not reinventing the wheel or anything but an engaging enough game that I am enjoying so far, not bad especially condidering how low in the barrell some ecchi games can scrape this one actully seems to be well made and the team behind it seem to care enough about it that it doesn't feel like shovelware or anything as can sometimes also happen. Plus I'm using an ancient laptop and it runs fine on that so also points for that I guess lol

Before I played Ark Re:Code i had a small wee wee, no friends, no waifu, depression and absolutely no will to live. None of these things have changed, but the game is pretty cool.

At first, I thought this was going to be a quick one. Hit start, play with my meat, admire those cow jugs, take care of business, delete it, move on. But no. Suddenly, I realized this wasn‚Äôt just lust, it was something darker, a fake relationship with a woman who doesn‚Äôt even exist outside of my imagination. Is this really what I‚Äôm supposed to do now? Society has collapsed and I am the rubble, holding a mouse with one hand and my dignity in the other.

The advantages? Oh! They‚Äôre endless. No heartbreak, no awkward small talk, no risk of someone ghosting me because they‚Äôre too busy ‚Äúworking on themselves.‚Äù My virtual goddess never shouts or argues, and always spawns right where I left her. Cheap, convenient, customizable. What a dream.

The disadvantages? Reality always creeps back in when the screen goes dark. No warmth, no real voice, just the cold hum of cabinet fans blowing at me like it pities me. You cannot cuddle a loading screen. You cannot fall asleep in love with a save file.

Why is it worth it? Because it is easy, and in this age of endless disappointment, easy feels like luxury. Until you remember that easy is also hollow, and hollow is what echoes in the room when you finally put your weapon down.

I like those boobs, mine are small, I don't care about gender anymore, send help!

This game is honestly excellent for it being a free game. Tits are huge, sex animations are incredible, great material and the game is constantly giving you what you want to see. 10/10 free hentai game.

Played erolabs version, started a new game, not bad at all. I like the fresh start even if its not day one exactly since it was on Nutaku. Good game, very grindy, not p2w at all compared to what others say, just git gud and learn strategy and priority. Good H scenes and good story too. Highly recommend

I notice a lot of people complaining about the difficulty of maxing out party members. But I can bet they are spending all their gems and tickets immediately on pulls. This is why,. The free characters are fine, and as long as you can just build a proper party, spend your currency on promote materials. I wont deny their will always be some wall, but its a free to play game, I've been playing for months " played before steam launch" and maybe spent 0.99 I'm still progressing just fine.  Also the art and animations remind me of Destiny child. Not literally, but it gives me the same vibe, Some of the best in the genre in my opinion.

So dont overextend your resources, Focus on a core 4 characters and be patient.

For yet another generic NSFW, F2P Mobile Game, this one actually has some pretty inventive ideas. Also, once you get  pretty decent way into the main campaign, at around the time you meet Ith, the game's story is actually pretty interesting, too! (Just ignore most of the stuff before that (And most of the stuff after that. Really, Ith is the only interesting part)). 
It does fall into a lot of the same trappings as the others, like there being so much nudity overload that it loses and and all punch, and you grow numb to it, and barely any the women actually look like humans due to their comically oversized proportions, but there's some promise here, and it's really enjoyable!
One small note; Why the FUCK do the Three Stars have unique designs? Most games like this just go for the most basic, and generic shit imaginable for it's "Common" tier characters, for a reason. In this game a lot of the Three Stars in this game have such fun and appealing designs that are genuinely WAY better than the Four and Five Stars, and that really sucks, since there's basically no way to actually interact with most of the Three Stars. Why? Why put your best, cutest, most appealing characters behind the Three Star lock so we can't interact them?!?! I want to do more with them than ANY of the Four or Five Stars, and I can't! What the hell? I mean, Belyn, Olga and Cindy are all FANTASTIC, I just wish I could DO something with them!
Alright, but seriously though, this is pretty solid, and does stand out from the crowd with a number of unique ideas. It takes a bit of time to get into it, but it's pretty solid.
Oh, and credit where it's due, this is the first F2P NSFW game I've seen where the shop ISN'T insanely overpriced.

First let me start by saying i don't leave comments. This game is very well put together, the live 2d art is perfect and i've never seen it done in a turn base rpg. Kind of like ff10's system. It offers the waifu's, scenes and i haven't played for too long but this is my 4th time logging in to play. It has a satisfying feeling of hentai and rpg elements. a gacha system but im ok with that. Honestly ive been playing their games for years now maybe 10. This is the best game Nutaku has made.

For yet another generic NSFW, F2P Mobile Game, this one actually has some pretty inventive ideas. Also, once you get  pretty decent way into the main campaign, at around the time you meet Ith, the game's story is actually pretty interesting, too! (Just ignore most of the stuff before that (And most of the stuff after that. Really, Ith is the only interesting part)). 
It does fall into a lot of the same trappings as the others, like there being so much nudity overload that it loses and and all punch, and you grow numb to it, and barely any the women actually look like humans due to their comically oversized proportions, but there's some promise here, and it's really enjoyable!
One small note; Why the FUCK do the Three Stars have unique designs? Most games like this just go for the most basic, and generic shit imaginable for it's "Common" tier characters, for a reason. In this game a lot of the Three Stars in this game have such fun and appealing designs that are genuinely WAY better than the Four and Five Stars, and that really sucks, since there's basically no way to actually interact with most of the Three Stars. Why? Why put your best, cutest, most appealing characters behind the Three Star lock so we can't interact them?!?! I want to do more with them than ANY of the Four or Five Stars, and I can't! What the hell? I mean, Belyn, Olga and Cindy are all FANTASTIC, I just wish I could DO something with them!
Alright, but seriously though, this is pretty solid, and does stand out from the crowd with a number of unique ideas. It takes a bit of time to get into it, but it's pretty solid.
Oh, and credit where it's due, this is the first F2P NSFW game I've seen where the shop ISN'T insanely overpriced.

negative.review: Try this game to witness how it transforms into an AI generated image gallery. Which is a shame, of course, because the handcrafted art and animations are of a high quality. And where is Melody? You can see her on the game banner, but not in the game itself.

TL;DR: go play limbus company and look at corn of the characters instead!

Inconsistent art (1/3rd seems to be like the early AI generated anime imagery), a ton of typos in the story (I genuinely mean a lot), variety of 'waifus' is nigh non-existent if you aren't looking for a bouncy castle of an anime character.
And the gameplay loop is easy and generic, setup for combos doesn't really exist.

Played until Chapter I part 4-10, did the virtual spiral (or whatever it's called) to lvl 13, which is essentially just a character level based 'difficulty' activity, that resets every now-and-then, which you can only do 3 times a day (with free stuff that is).

Upgrading characters is essentially time-limited (xp materials generate every day), same with upgrading them (disciplining 40/day at the beginning), which wouldn't be a problem, except you can freely upgrade like 6 characters, when you can (potentially) get 30 characters within the first 2-3 hours of playing.

There are both universal and character specific upgrade materials as well (maybe class, maybe elemental) which isn't a problem at the very beginning, but when you need to farm 50 of a single material to buff a single character it becomes very grindy.

Overall my time is mainly spent reading broken dialogue of a bad story while trying to get trough fights as fast as possible, because strategizing doesn't work if the bosses die in 1-5 turns, it's literally just spam something and they'll die.

If the combat was more fun this would be an OK game, but as it stands it's mediocre at best and a waste of time at worse.

Go play Limbus company, or some short games like Yuki Ê∏ÖÈÜíÊ¢¶, ENA: Dream BBQ or if you want (arguably ok) action play Katawa Shoujo. All of them give you a better experience than this waste of data.

It's a cuck game, almost all the girls are whores, story wise it's mediocre, F2P? yeah and moon were made out of cheese, it's P2W, you essentially cucked by the game for not spending money, then you're cucked by the girls that you chasing cause they all whores.
Some good points like highest mountain tops, some bad points like great plains of Netherlands, just not for me chief.
alot of gross asian blah blah with boring conversations. forces you to play when all you want to do is exit and uninstall game

I downloaded this for S & G's, just to have a gander at what "adult" content looks like in video games lol im 35 and never looked before but lemme tell you how hard im laughing at the fact the game doesnt even work haha. the loading bar just kept cycling over and over when i tried to start the game. idk why i find this so funny exactly but i suspect it has something to do with my expectations of corniness being at an all time high with this experience and this is definitely corny lol the game about sex is having performance anxiety lmao
Pay buttons everywhere. this is dumb
you will hit impassable sections to force a purchase

Try this game to witness how it transforms into an AI generated image gallery. Which is a shame, of course, because the handcrafted art and animations are of a high quality. And where is Melody? You can see her on the game banner, but not in the game itself.
It's just another team battle game with insane macro-transactions. There's nothing really special here and even with nudity, this game is just boring.

Utterly tedious auto-battler with all the usual pay-to-win nonsense. The battle mechanics are so dull the first thing the tutorial teaches is to switch it to auto. The plot is the usual mess of everything they could think of, told through piles of dialog to click through (thankfully there's a skip button for that).

In 2025, the game still forces you to play the way the developer wants you to. You can't skip to adjust the settings while the game is screaming like crazy. After 30 minutes, you still have to click on what the game wants you to do. You still can't adjust the settings.

While making the first purchase via the game shop, I received a spam email trying to steal my personal information. I don't know if this is from Steam or your game. 
Please do check your payment link.
Boring, extremely grindy, F2P with high priced microtransactions, huge time sink with very little to offer for your devotion.

Put in all the free titties you want if you open a game full-screen and don't give me immediate access to basic system options to set my resolution & windowed mode the exact way I want them you can screw right off

This game's updates selectively cull players.

Just like this time, a meteorite fell during the last update.

I was lucky enough to survive last time, but it seems I didn't this time.

When I start the game, it freezes before the menu appears.

I can't even contact support.

Starts off good and i really love a challenge but it stops being fun due to what's written below...
It's hard to level up once you've done everything to the point of being too weak to win anymore like me.
The exp for your girls doesn't scale the further you go Into the story which is a horrific flaw that makes it hard to try new things at all. It takes too long to completely max out even 1 of your girls I should know 25 hours later and i still am not able to turn my 5 star to a 6 star despite my tunnel vision.
